name: panda tiles tf keras cohen kappa loss baseline

description: Lower layers are fixed at ImageNet weights. Load essential modules. Check GPUs availability. Train the model Inference path to save model pretrained model from efficientnet package version for the model to be saved 16 128x128 tiles are selected from each image and mask a fast image augmentation library This function selects tiles of size x for image of and mask based on the maximum number of tissue pixels. Tiles of imageLoad whole slide image WSI and select 16 128x128 tiles from each image according to the number of tissure pixels. Load dataAugmentationGet statistics of images composed of tiles. Lower layers from EfficientNetB3 are fixed at ImageNet weights. com iafoss panda 16x128x128 tiles PANDA keras baseline from Noble https www. Update to TensorFlow 2. Version 1 Only the top fully connected layer is trained. The generated data in a batch ModelModel based on EfficientNetB3 Plot of the top layers from EfficientNetB3 base model. data frame with the image_id encode label list pretrained weights with ImageNet set more layers trainable pretrained weights with ImageNet. Layer block7b_add and above layers are trained. Check TensorFlow and TensorFlow Addons version. CohenKappa metric and WeightedKappaLoose are used as implemented in TensorFlow Addons 0. ValueError axes don t match array Version 4 Load saved weights from Version 1 using the same model as Version 1. QWKs for train and validation set are both 0. Then set more layers trainable. com nobletp panda keras baseline Thank you for sharing This model uses quadratic weighted kappa QWK as loss and metric as implemented in TensorFlow Addons. PANDA baselineThis notebook got inspirations from PANDA 16X128X128 tiles from Iafoss https www. 0 and TensorFlow Addons 0. Version 2 Top layers from block7b_add and above from EfficientNetB3 base model are also trained.
